public GroovyClassloaderFactory(boolean resolve,

                                boolean recompile,
                                ClasspathContainer classPath,
                                groovy.lang.GroovyClassLoader classLoader,
                                BridgedClassLoader bridgedLoader)
Parameters:
resolve - whether loaded classes should be resolved
codeBase - the code base to be used for SecurityManager
recompile - whether recompilation should be enabled
classPath - classpath to be used
classLoader - preconfigured classloader
bridgedLoader - the bridge to be used for loading classes

isRecompile

public java.lang.Boolean isRecompile()
Returns:
true => recompilation is enabled,
false => recompilation is disabled,
null => default configuration of GroovyClassLoader is used
